scenario.name: REGISTER flood
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;expires=3600 Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: SIPp-bench/1.0
